00047 void initNumInput(NumInput *n)
00048 {
00049     n->flag     =
00050     n->idx      =
00051     n->idx_max  =
00052     n->inv[0]   =
00053     n->inv[1]   =
00054     n->inv[2]   =
00055     n->ctrl[0]  = 
00056     n->ctrl[1]  = 
00057     n->ctrl[2]  = 0;
00058 
00059     n->val[0]   = 
00060     n->val[1]   = 
00061     n->val[2]   = 0.0f;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void outputNumInput(NumInput *n, char *str)
00065 {
00066     char cur;
00067     char inv[] = "1/";
00068     short i, j;
00069 
00070     for (j = 0; j <= n->idx_max; j++) {
00071         /* if AFFECTALL and no number typed and cursor not on number, use first number */
00072         if (n->flag & NUM_AFFECT_ALL && n->idx != j && n->ctrl[j] == 0)
00073             i = 0;
00074         else
00075             i = j;
00076 
00077         if (n->idx != i)
00078             cur = ' ';
00079         else
00080             cur = '|';
00081 
00082         if (n->inv[i])
00083             inv[0] = '1';
00084         else
00085             inv[0] = 0;
00086 
00087         if (n->val[i] > 1e10f || n->val[i] < -1e10f)
00088             BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.4e%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00089         else
00090             switch (n->ctrl[i]) {
00091                 case 0:
00092                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%sNONE%c", inv, cur);
00093                     break;
00094                 case 1:
00095                 case -1:
00096                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.0f%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00097                     break;
00098                 case 10:
00099                 case -10:
00100                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.f.%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00101                     break;
00102                 case 100:
00103                 case -100:
00104                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.1f%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00105                     break;
00106                 case 1000:
00107                 case -1000:
00108                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.2f%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00109                     break;
00110                 case 10000:
00111                 case -10000:
00112                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.3f%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00113                     break;
00114                 default:
00115                     BLI_snprintf(&str[j * 20], 20, "%s%.4e%c", inv, n->val[i], cur);
00116             }
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 short hasNumInput(NumInput *n)
00121 {
00122     short i;
00123 
00124     for (i = 0; i <= n->idx_max; i++) {
00125         if (n->ctrl[i])
00126             return 1;
00127     }
00128 
00129     return 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 void applyNumInput(NumInput *n, float *vec)
00133 {
00134     short i, j;
00135 
00136     if (hasNumInput(n)) {
00137         for (j = 0; j <= n->idx_max; j++) {
00138             /* if AFFECTALL and no number typed and cursor not on number, use first number */
00139             if (n->flag & NUM_AFFECT_ALL && n->idx != j && n->ctrl[j] == 0)
00140                 i = 0;
00141             else
00142                 i = j;
00143 
00144             if (n->ctrl[i] == 0 && n->flag & NUM_NULL_ONE) {
00145                 vec[j] = 1.0f;
00146             }
00147             else if (n->val[i] == 0.0f && n->flag & NUM_NO_ZERO) {
00148                 vec[j] = 0.0001f;
00149             }
00150             else {
00151                 if (n->inv[i]) {
00152                     vec[j] = 1.0f / n->val[i];
00153                 }
00154                 else {
00155                     vec[j] = n->val[i];
00156                 }
00157             }
00158         }
00159     }
00160 }
00161 
00162 char handleNumInput(NumInput *n, wmEvent *event)
00163 {
00164     float Val = 0;
00165     short idx = n->idx, idx_max = n->idx_max;
00166 
00167     if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
00168         switch (event->val) {
00169             case NUM_MODAL_INCREMENT_UP:
00170                 if (!n->ctrl[idx])
00171                     n->ctrl[idx] = 1;
00172 
00173                 n->val[idx] += n->increment;
00174                 break;
00175             case NUM_MODAL_INCREMENT_DOWN:
00176                 if (!n->ctrl[idx])
00177                     n->ctrl[idx] = 1;
00178 
00179                 n->val[idx] -= n->increment;
00180                 break;
00181             default:
00182                 return 0;
00183         }
00184     }
00185     else {
00186         switch (event->type) {
00187             case BACKSPACEKEY:
00188                 if (n->ctrl[idx] == 0) {
00189                     n->val[0]       =
00190                         n->val[1]   =
00191                         n->val[2]   = 0.0f;
00192                     n->ctrl[0]      =
00193                         n->ctrl[1]  =
00194                         n->ctrl[2]  = 0;
00195                     n->inv[0]       =
00196                         n->inv[1]   =
00197                         n->inv[2]   = 0;
00198                 }
00199                 else {
00200                     n->val[idx] = 0.0f;
00201                     n->ctrl[idx] = 0;
00202                     n->inv[idx] = 0;
00203                 }
00204                 break;
00205             case PERIODKEY:
00206             case PADPERIOD:
00207                 if (n->flag & NUM_NO_FRACTION)
00208                     return 0;
00209 
00210                 switch (n->ctrl[idx])
00211                 {
00212                     case 0:
00213                     case 1:
00214                         n->ctrl[idx] = 10;
00215                         break;
00216                     case -1:
00217                         n->ctrl[idx] = -10;
00218                 }
00219                 break;
00220             case PADMINUS:
00221                 if (event->alt)
00222                     break;
00223             case MINUSKEY:
00224                 if (n->flag & NUM_NO_NEGATIVE)
00225                     break;
00226 
00227                 if (n->ctrl[idx]) {
00228                     n->ctrl[idx] *= -1;
00229                     n->val[idx] *= -1;
00230                 }
00231                 else
00232                     n->ctrl[idx] = -1;
00233                 break;
00234             case PADSLASHKEY:
00235             case SLASHKEY:
00236                 if (n->flag & NUM_NO_FRACTION)
00237                     return 0;
00238 
00239                 n->inv[idx] = !n->inv[idx];
00240                 break;
00241             case TABKEY:
00242                 if (idx_max == 0)
00243                     return 0;
00244 
00245                 idx++;
00246                 if (idx > idx_max)
00247                     idx = 0;
00248                 n->idx = idx;
00249                 break;
00250             case PAD9:
00251             case NINEKEY:
00252                 Val += 1.0f;
00253             case PAD8:
00254             case EIGHTKEY:
00255                 Val += 1.0f;
00256             case PAD7:
00257             case SEVENKEY:
00258                 Val += 1.0f;
00259             case PAD6:
00260             case SIXKEY:
00261                 Val += 1.0f;
00262             case PAD5:
00263             case FIVEKEY:
00264                 Val += 1.0f;
00265             case PAD4:
00266             case FOURKEY:
00267                 Val += 1.0f;
00268             case PAD3:
00269             case THREEKEY:
00270                 Val += 1.0f;
00271             case PAD2:
00272             case TWOKEY:
00273                 Val += 1.0f;
00274             case PAD1:
00275             case ONEKEY:
00276                 Val += 1.0f;
00277             case PAD0:
00278             case ZEROKEY:
00279                 if (!n->ctrl[idx])
00280                     n->ctrl[idx] = 1;
00281 
00282                 if (fabsf(n->val[idx]) > 9999999.0f) ;
00283                 else if (n->ctrl[idx] == 1) {
00284                     n->val[idx] *= 10;
00285                     n->val[idx] += Val;
00286                 }
00287                 else if (n->ctrl[idx] == -1) {
00288                     n->val[idx] *= 10;
00289                     n->val[idx] -= Val;
00290                 }
00291                 else {
00292                     /* float resolution breaks when over six digits after comma */
00293                     if (ABS(n->ctrl[idx]) < 10000000) {
00294                         n->val[idx] += Val / (float)n->ctrl[idx];
00295                         n->ctrl[idx] *= 10;
00296                     }
00297                 }
00298                 break;
00299             default:
00300                 return 0;
00301         }
00302     }
00303     
00304     // printf("%f\n", n->val[idx]);
00305 
00306     /* REDRAW SINCE NUMBERS HAVE CHANGED */
00307     return 1;
00308 }
